# Social Profile Services

**API Collection**

The predefined constants are used to identify social networking services.

## Overview

You may use these constants or any other string.

The value of these constants is undefined until one of the following functions has been called: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABAddressBookCreate()], [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPersonCreate()], [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABGroupCreate()]. Neither developers nor users can add more keys.

## Services

- **kABSocialProfileServiceTwitter**: Twitter social profile service.
- **kABSocialProfileServiceFacebook**: Facebook social profile service.
- **kABSocialProfileServiceMySpace**: Myspace social profile service.
- **kABSocialProfileServiceLinkedIn**: LinkedIn social profile service.
- **kABSocialProfileServiceFlickr**: Flickr social profile service.
- **kABSocialProfileServiceSinaWeibo**: Sina Weibo social profile service.

## Keys

- **kABSocialProfileURLKey**: Social profile URL.
- **kABSocialProfileServiceKey**: Social profile service.
- **kABSocialProfileUsernameKey**: Social profile username.
- **kABSocialProfileUserIdentifierKey**: Social profile user identifier.

## Social Media Constants

- **Instant Messaging Keys**: The keys used to specify the different fields in a [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABInstantMessageProperty] property.
- **Instant Messaging Services**: The predefined constants are used to identify instant messaging services.
